channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: DotCIO Tech Tip Tuesday: Browser Keyboard Shortcuts
item.description: If you use Chrome, MS Edge, Firefox, or Safari, why not use your browser shortcut keys? They can help you work more quickly and efficiently; be more productive by allowing you to do multiple tasks at once; and assist in locking your screen or switch between open windows and apps.
item.author: Community

item.title: NORDTECH Workforce Development Summit to be Held July 18
item.description: Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM - The Northeast Regional Defense Technology Hub (NORDTECH) is organizing a day-long Workforce Development for Chips and Semiconductors Summit that will be held on Rensselaer’s Troy campus. The day will feature a keynote speech, a panel discussion, presentations from leading institutions and NORDTECH partners, breakout sessions, and a poster session. Register today to save your place!
item.author: Community

item.title: Arch Night with President Schmidt to be Held July 23
item.description: Date: Tuesday, July 23, 2024 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM - Arch students from the School of Science and Humanities, Arts, and Social Sciences are invited to join President Schmidt at his home, alongside faculty, staff, and alumni, for an excellent opportunity for students to network and have meaningful conversations about their Arch summer semester and plans for their semester away. Please RSVP by July 12 via Handshake; space is limited and available on a first-come, first-served basis.
item.author: Students

item.title: GS Precision Info Session Part of CCPD Virtual Summer Series
item.description: Please join the team at GS Precision from 6:30PM to 7:30PM on Thursday, July 11 to learn about career paths and company culture within the organization, as well as upcoming opportunities for Arch students seeking an Away experience. Also be sure to check out GS Precision’s Engineer Internship and Engineering Lean and Continuous Improvement Co-Op opportunities!
item.author: Students

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Host Systems Engineering and Technology Management Review
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Hosted by Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., this information session focuses on Rensselaer’s flexible, project-based, online Systems Engineering and Technology Management graduate degree that will help prepare decision-makers with broader and deeper capabilities in leading dynamic organizations. Please register if you plan to attend.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: TIAA Holding Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling Sessions July 18
item.description:
Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
